vimlsp.indexes.runtimepath.description: if index vim's runtimepath files, this will effect the suggest

vimlsp.indexes.count.description: count of files index at the same time, change to greater will speed up index but will cause high CPU usage for some time

vimlsp.indexes.gap.description: time gap between parse file, change to smaller will speed up index but will cause high CPU usage for some time

vimlsp.suggest.fromRuntimepath.description: completeitems from runtimepath's vim files, if this is true that fromVimruntime is true

vimlsp.trace.server.description: Trace level of vim language server

svg.completion.insertCloseTagSign.title: Insert close tag sign
svg.completion.insertCloseTagSign.description: Specifies whether insert close tag sign '>'

svg.completion.showAdvanced.title: Show advanced items in completion list.
svg.completion.showAdvanced.description: Specifies whether advanced items that are not commonly used are displayed in the AutoComplete list.

svg.completion.showDeprecated.title: Show deprecated items in completion list.
svg.completion.showDeprecated.description: Specifies whether advanced items that are deprecated are displayed in the AutoComplete list.

svg.disableFormatOnSave.title: [Experimental]Disable SVGO Format on save
svg.disableFormatOnSave.description: Focus Disable SVGO Format On Save event if editor.formatOnSave is true

svg.format.plugins.title: SVGO plugins array.
svg.format.plugins.description: Each items corresponds to a plugin that should be enabled, the rest is disabled.

svg.preview.backgroundCustom.title: Svg Preview Custom Background
svg.preview.backgroundCustom.description: Specifies the Svg Preview Custom Background

svg.version.title: SVG Version
svg.version.description: Specifies the SVG standard version that will be used for autocompletion and validation.
